```{python}
import numpy as np
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import seaborn as sns
```

```{python}
def sin_plot(n=10, flip=1):
    x = np.linspace(0, 14, 100)
    for i in range(1, n + 1):
        plt.plot(x, np.sin(x + i * 0.5) * (n + 2 - i) * flip)
```

```{python}
sin_plot()
```
